name: Mountain Dwarf Defender
description: The Mountain Dwarf Defender is a robust medium humanoid known for its sturdy build and capabilities in melee combat, often wielding a warhammer and a lance while mounted.
memorable: Exceptional defensive skills that resist being moved or knocked prone, combined with inspiring allies in battle.
goals: To stand firm on the battlefield, protect allies, and engage in melee combat.
relations: Often found alongside other dwarves or knights, serving as protectors or warriors.
environment: Typically found in mountainous terrains or battlefields.
strengths: High armor class and exceptional melee attack capabilities, resilient against fear and physical displacements.
weaknesses: Limited effectiveness in ranged combat, with disadvantage when attacking close targets.
attacks: Strikes with a warhammer for bludgeoning damage, uses a lance effectively while mounted, also has a ranged attack with a heavy crossbow.
most_powerful_ability: Knightly Inspiration, which grants allies bonuses on attack rolls and saving throws.
senses: Passive perception score of 12 indicating above-average awareness.
skills: Skilled in athletics, showcasing exceptional physical capabilities.
additional_information: Brave: Advantage on saving throws against fear.
Steadfast: Resists being pushed or knocked prone.
Multiattack: Can attack twice with their warhammer.
Mounted combat with increased damage using the lance.
Inspires allies with Knightly Inspiration, enhancing their combat effectiveness.

dwarf that inspires allies in combat
